title: Herbert Hoover
deleted: Despite his politics, Hoover was never a [[Teetotalism|teetotaler]]. While serving as Secretary of Commerce he would often stop at the Belgian embassy for [[cocktail]]s.<ref>{{cite book |last1=Okrent |first1=Daniel |title=Last Call: The Rise and Fall of Prohibition  |date=May 11, 2010 |publisher=Scribner |isbn=978-0743277020  |at=loc 5771(Kindle) |author-link=Daniel Okrent }}</ref>
